thread.title: Devon MP blames Brexit for Tory collapse

author: Neil_Shaw
title: Devon MP blames Brexit for Tory collapse
text:
Devon MP blames Brexit for Tory collapse By Neil_Shaw | Posted: June 09, 2017 By Gayle McDonald Devon MP blames Brexit for Tory collapse Devon MP blames Brexit for Tory collapse X 
Copy link to paste in your message / 
A Devon Conservative MP has blamed Brexit for the Tories' crumbling support in last night's election result. 
Gary Streeter said the people of the Uk had exercised their power and demonstrated their free choice. 
After being re-elected as South West Devon MP for the third time, the Conservative MP said he would fight for all those he represented regardless of who they voted for. 
During his victory speech, he thanked the other candidates for what he described as a fair and hard fought contest. 
He said: "It's been a very hard fought, very fair election and I think we've all become friends and I'm hugely in favour of that kind of politics." 
He added: "I'd like to thank the people of South West Devon for placing their confidence in me once again and I pledge myself to work hard for all of them however anybody has voted to try to improve the lives of everyone living in South Devon." 
Mr Streeter went on to suggest that the national fall in support for the Tories was primarily due to Brexit. 
He added: "Whenever I go and speak to school children and talk about democracy, I say to them politicians can make speeches, politicians can bring forward policies but in the end the power lies with the people. 
"I guess tonight we are seeing another demonstration of that, that the people of this country have done something that some of us didn't want them to do but it's their choice in this free democracy to do as they wish and that's the wonder and the joy of democracy and long may it be so."
